meanings.definition: Belugas: a type of white whale
meanings.sent1: The belugas swam gracefully in the icy waters.
meanings.sent2: We saw a pod of belugas during our whale watching tour.
meanings.sent3: The belugas seemed to be having a chat with each other underwater.
meanings.sent4: The belugas danced through the waves like elegant ballerinas.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the belugas breaching was truly mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Belugas: plural form of beluga, referring to multiple white whales
meanings.sent1: Many belugas gathered near the Arctic coast.
meanings.sent2: The researchers studied the migration patterns of belugas.
meanings.sent3: The belugas organized a synchronized swimming competition.
meanings.sent4: The belugas moved in unison, like a choir of angels in the sea.
meanings.sent5: The playful antics of the belugas delighted the onlookers.
